channel.title: Crash on start up has spread to all sdk related games
channel.description:
Hello, I'm pretty upset right now. I've tried for hours to get this mod going on both this and last weekend. As my situation currently stands, I cannot run black mesa and I cannot run any other game that uses the sdk.
Here is the process of my latest attempt: I completely uninstalled ALL local content including the steam client. I downloaded black mesa and steam. I proceeded to install half life 2. Tested the installation of half life 2, still non-functional even after a complete wipe and reinstallation. I verified the integrity of the installations of hl2, sdk 2006 and sdk 2007 and they all came back 100% positive. I will attempt to install the mod and try it anyway, though I'm positive it won't work. UPDATE: It didn't. :*(
Specs: win7 home premium x64 sp1 i7-2630QM GTX 570m with updated drivers
I would at least love to get my original games working again. I have no idea why this would affect all my other games even after a wipe and reinstallation. Anything you can do would be much appreciated.

item.title: Crash on start up has spread to all sdk related games
item.dc:creator: Sephiroth
item.description:
happyapplesauce:

bump.

I would really appreciate some help from the modding team or someone who works with the team. If you guys can’t fix my problem, then please AT LEAST make an announcement that downloading and attempting to install your mod can potentially fuck up other steam games.

Don’t misinterpret this, as I do empathise with you, but it doesn’t sound like BMS caused the SDK to mess up or you other games, all the installer does is install bms correctly, it doest change anything to do with the SDK, or other HL games, in just creates the BMS folder and uncompresses files to it. it sounds like there is something wrong though for other games to not work,maybe you should upload the minidump as requested in the stickies within the bug section I would ensure all graphic drivers are up to date and maybe try to look for a fix on steam forums for the SDK/HL games.

item.dc:creator: _Sc0rPi0
item.description:
Did you install both, Source SDK Base 2006 and Source SDK Base 2007 and do you used backup discs for the SDK install?

You should upgrade your 7 with the official SP1 from Microsoft if you haven’t already.

Then i would recommend you to completely re-download the full SDK Base 2006 and 2007 in Steam (Library -> Tools).

And also check out the Source SDK FAQ from the Valve Dev Community, maybe you find a solution in it.
